name: CYBERHYVE
description:
Year: 1986 A.D.

Objective: Navigate the labyrinthine, CYBERHYVE, and disable the weaponized A.I. program, Bianca, and her Drone Defense System.

Controls(Keyboard Required):

Movement = Arrow Keys

Action Button = Space Bar

Pause = 'P' key

Download Instructions:

Download Zip file

Extract all from folder

Save folder to Desktop

Click Exe File
